attributes.action: Paying for parking on services no showers access no toilets no food
attributes.additional_details: Let us have access too basic toilet facilities at delivering or loading points as we are beein denied by company’s
attributes.background: Make parking free for trucks on services  access too showers and food while been on the road while delivering items anyone needs or uses we are away for long periods of time and are beein denied these

rejection.details:
Since you started this petition, most service stations are now providing access to showers and other facilities.

Decisions about access to private premises' facilities and parking charges would be a decision for individual operators, and not for the UK Government or Parliament.
